words.source: Vav-consecutive + Qal imperfect 3ms of עלה (alah); KJV 'went up', ESV 'went up', NASB 'went up'
Proper noun, masculine singular; all translations 'Joseph'
Preposition ל + Qal infinitive construct of קבר (qabar); KJV 'to bury', ESV 'to bury', NASB 'to bury'
Direct object marker; no English equivalent, marks אביו as direct object
Noun masculine singular construct + 3ms possessive suffix; KJV 'his father', ESV 'his father', NASB 'his father'
Vav-consecutive + Qal imperfect 3mp of עלה (alah); KJV 'went up', ESV 'went up', NASB 'went up'
Preposition את (et) + 3ms suffix; KJV 'with him', ESV 'with him', NASB 'with him'
Noun masculine singular construct; KJV 'all', ESV 'all', NASB 'all'
Noun masculine plural construct of עבד (eved); KJV 'servants', ESV 'servants', NASB 'servants'
Proper noun, masculine singular; KJV 'Pharaoh', ESV 'Pharaoh', NASB 'Pharaoh'
Noun masculine plural construct of זקן (zaqen); KJV 'elders', ESV 'elders', NASB 'elders'
Noun masculine singular construct + 3ms suffix; KJV 'his house', ESV 'his household', NASB 'his household'
Vav-conjunction + noun masculine singular construct; KJV 'and all', ESV 'and all', NASB 'and all'
Noun masculine plural construct of זקן (zaqen); KJV 'elders', ESV 'elders', NASB 'elders'
Noun feminine singular; KJV 'land', ESV 'land', NASB 'land'
